thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend stay
thread.title_full: Weekend stay - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lynda C
title: Weekend stay
text:
We have stayed here for the 2nd time in 13 months. It is perfectly located at the edge of the Westfield Centre, & also the transport links to the City & other tourist attractions.
The hotel itself is very clean & spacious, the staff are extremely friendly & helpful & there is a good choice of meals in the restaurant. The breakfasts are wonderful, so much to choose from.
A highly recommended hotel, reasonably priced & extremely comfortable. We will be staying there again when we visit London again.
